name: LoL Free Champion Rotation
author: alurosu

sections.description:
Every week there are 15 new League of Legends champions you can try for free. Our plugin lets you show their icons in any WordPress website. We connect to the Riot Games API, cache the data every hour on our server (alurosu.com) and we forward the data to you. Our service is free to use and doesn’t require an account or any access key.

Shortcode examples:

  • [lolrotation]
  • [lolrotation width=50%]
  • [lolrotation width=400 creditauthor=1]

Disclaimer: LoL Free Champion Rotation isn’t endorsed by Riot Games and doesn’t reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance->Widgets and add LoL Free Champion Rotation to any sidebar
  4. Enter a title and a width if you wish.
  5. Hit save and you’re done!

Alternative

  • Add the [lolrotation] shortcode to any page or post.
  • Optional: set the width and enable/disable author url like this: [lolrotation width=400 creditauthor=1]
